original_text: His sons used to go and hold a feast in the house of each one on his day, and they would send and invite their three sisters to eat and drink with them.
korean_text: 그의 아들들이 자기 생일에 각각 자기의 집에서 잔치를 베풀고 그의 누이 세 명도 청하여 함께 먹고 마시더라

sentences.original_text: His sons used to go and hold a feast
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들들은 가서 잔치를 열곤 했는데

sentences.original_text: in the house of each one on his day
and they would send and invite their three sisters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 누이 세 사람을 청하러 보내곤 했고

sentences.original_text: to eat and drink with them
